CRD_Laezel.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option.This specific dialog occurs after tieflings have been massacred.
CRD_Laezel.how_to_trigger: Talk to Laezel during Raider Celebration

CRD_Astarion.synopsis: Astarion is enjoying himself at a party with the goblins. You've betrayed and slaughtered the tieflings and he's finally able to indulge his hedonistic side. He's drinking blood, but offers you wine. He or you can propose that you get together tonight and enjoy a little more hedonism when everyone else is asleep.

CRD_Shadowheart.synopsis: After the goblin victory slaughtering the tieflings, Shadowheart is very inebriated in camp. She feels guilty about the massacre, but can't comprehend why. As a result, she's belligerent and moody with the player unless actively calmed down.
CRD_Shadowheart.how_to_trigger: - Load Wild Main A- Add shadowheart to party via debug book- Open recon:- oe readyattackonden- oe attackondenraidervictory- SetGlobalOsirisFlag DEN_AttackOnDen_Event_GoblinPartyInvitation- Go to camp- Skip though opening camp dialogue- talk to Shadowheart

CRD_Gale.synopsis: The player sided with the drow and goblins and participated in the massacre of the grove. Gale is shocked by what happened and the fact that he participated in the slaughter. He wants to leave, so the player has to convince him to stay if indeed he wants Gale to stay. The mood and tone are dour and dark.

CRD_Laezel_2.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_2.text: We must not forget this night. True allies are few.

CRD_Laezel_4.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_4.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

CRD_Laezel_23.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_23.text: Soon. When you rest, I will come.

CRD_Laezel_62.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_62.text: Yes, I must have you tonight.

CRD_Laezel_60.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_60.text: I have seen the kith'raki tear a screaming neogi's legs from its belly to fashion into blades.

CRD_Laezel_34.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_34.text: Yet they could not match your nerve today. It was enough to drive me to madness.
CRD_Laezel_34.context: NodeContext: She takes a shuddering breath at the end.

CRD_Laezel_54.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_54.text: I smell their blood on you still. I smell your moisture.

CRD_Laezel_42.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_42.text: A glorious reward for a glorious battle.

CRD_Laezel_44.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_44.text: Go on, have your fun. And do not wipe away a single bead of sweat. It's intoxicating.

CRD_Laezel_32.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_32.text: How torturous for us both that I'll never get a taste.

CRD_Laezel_71.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_71.text: I smell their blood on you still. I'd have liked to have tasted it.

CRD_Laezel_53.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_53.text: Too bad for us both your bunk will be quite busy. Take all the pleasures you can, before dawn brings their end.

CRD_Laezel_12.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_12.text: I smell their blood on you still. I smell your sweat.

CRD_Laezel_65.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_65.text: You know the fortune of my company.
CRD_Laezel_65.context: NodeContext: Said with a bit of a sigh, but not too meanly. She does not like rejection but this is still a more intimate scene

CRD_Laezel_73.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_73.text: Another fortune yet stands before you. A warrior's flesh, rarely tasted.

CRD_Laezel_11.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_11.text: Bah - think if you must. The chance will pass come light of day.

CRD_Laezel_49.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_49.text: Given our history, I can't believe you're asking. And I can't believe I'm saying 'yes'...

CRD_Laezel_20.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_20.text: Then taste it. I want you in my bed tonight.

CRD_Laezel_19.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_19.context: NodeContext: Said with a sexy, steely confidence.

CRD_Laezel_72.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_72.text: When you lie down for the night, I will come.

CRD_Laezel_83.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_83.text: And I will take what is mine.

CRD_Laezel_80.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_80.text: I'd love to share my bed with you tonight.

CRD_Laezel_75.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_75.text: I'd love nothing more, but I'm afraid I can't touch anyone until my engine is fixed.

CRD_Laezel_6.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_6.text: A loathsome hurdle. Watching you burn lit a fire in me I could not quench alone.

CRD_Laezel_29.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_29.text: I will have to seek relief elsewhere.

CRD_Laezel_5.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_5.text: Are you asking me for sex?

CRD_Laezel_27.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_27.text: A night such as this calls for flesh to feast on. And I have chosen the sweetest.

CRD_Laezel_68.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_68.text: No, I'm sorry. I don't see you as an intimate partner.

CRD_Laezel_15.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_15.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me. Astarion looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_56.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_56.text: I will not go long without pleasure.

CRD_Laezel_38.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_38.text: There are, after all, other spreads before me.

CRD_Laezel_48.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_48.text: A pity for us you have promised your body to Astarion.

CRD_Laezel_64.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_64.text: I hope for your sake he doesn't come too near your neck.

CRD_Laezel_81.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_81.text: Maybe another night? It could be sweeter for waiting.

CRD_Laezel_79.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_79.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish. Astarion looks particularly tempting tonight.

CRD_Laezel_41.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_41.text: I will take pleasure when I wish, and from whom I wish.

CRD_Laezel_39.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_39.text: One day, fortune may favour you.

CRD_Laezel_92.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_92.text: You might still persuade me to share the night with you instead.

CRD_Laezel_28.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_28.text: I will do no such thing - not when you have turned your back on me so often.

CRD_Laezel_17.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_17.text: But come morning, you will wonder.

CRD_Laezel_24.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_24.text: You will wonder how my lips might have tasted, how my fingers on your skin might have felt.

CRD_Laezel_88.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_88.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself. Astarion looks particularly tempting.

CRD_Laezel_18.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_18.text: Oh, but do enjoy yourself this night. I intend to, myself.

CRD_Laezel_36.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_36.text: You are a gifted warrior. It was pleasure enough to fight at your side.

CRD_Laezel_13.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_13.text: Vlaakith demands of me no less.

CRD_Laezel_77.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_77.text: Mm - if only I might lay claim to my proper trophy.

CRD_Laezel_10.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_10.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to Gale.

CRD_Laezel_55.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_55.text: I've no doubt he will satisfy your tastes for endless conversation.

CRD_Laezel_21.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_21.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to the half-elf.

CRD_Laezel_35.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_35.text: I've no doubt she will satisfy your tastes for endless conversation.

CRD_Laezel_84.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_84.text: A pity for us you have promised your night to the drow.

CRD_Laezel_30.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_30.text: A pity for us both you've turned your back on me so often.

CRD_Laezel_93.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_93.text: A pity indeed. Maybe we can make amends some other night?

CRD_Laezel_76.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_76.text: That's fine - I'm not interested anyway.

CRD_Laezel_86.speaker: Player
CRD_Laezel_86.text: You are a gifted warrior. It was pleasure enough to fight at your side.

CRD_Laezel_61.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_61.text: Vlaakith demands of me no less.

CRD_Laezel_58.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_58.text: If only you'd earned the right to lay at my side.

CRD_Laezel_67.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_67.text: To think you might have known paradise.

CRD_Laezel_78.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_78.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

CRD_Laezel_87.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_87.text: Celebrate now. Come dawn, we depart.

CRD_Laezel_94.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_94.text: 'Turn your back not to your ally, lest you would see it pierced.' A githyanki dictum.

CRD_Laezel_37.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_37.text: A lesson you might have heeded, had your flesh not been weak.

CRD_Laezel_91.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_91.text: Associate as you wish. Indulge yourself at your own peril.

CRD_Laezel_31.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_Laezel_31.text: A lesson taught in flesh and bone this very night. Associate as you wish. Avert your eyes at your peril.

CRD_Astarion_0.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_0.text: Don't you love the silence after a massacre? It's just so pure.

CRD_Astarion_60.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_60.text: Certainly better than pillow talk with your drow lover, hmm?

CRD_Astarion_17.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_17.text: If you're here to beg forgiveness, save your breath. My cup and I are perfectly happy together.

CRD_Astarion_36.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_36.text: Well hello. Welcome to my humble party.

CRD_Astarion_38.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_38.text: I'm afraid it's warm, but needs must.

CRD_Astarion_25.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_25.text: You're a conquering hero and you want to drink foaming piss?

CRD_Astarion_13.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_13.text: Not that I'm judging, of course.

CRD_Astarion_27.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_27.text: So, what are we drinking to? Other than a pile of corpses.
CRD_Astarion_27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.NodeContext: Pouring you a drink. You both pick up your cups.

CRD_Astarion_96.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raising glass to player and takes a drinkNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

CRD_Astarion_20.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raising glass to player and takes a drinkNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

CRD_Astarion_123.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_123.text: To getting rid of this tadpole.

CRD_Astarion_177.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_177.context: CinematicNodeContext: Raising glass to player and takes a drinkNodeContext: With a grunt. Downbeat. He's not keen on losing the tadpole, but he still toasts and drinks

CRD_Astarion_66.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_66.text: Oh don't be so sour - it's a party.

CRD_Astarion_138.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_138.text: You did what you had to. Don't be ashamed that you did it well.

CRD_Astarion_15.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_15.text: I wish things had turned out differently.

CRD_Astarion_35.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_35.text: And I wish I was drinking out of the skulls of everyone who's ever wronged me. Life is tough.

CRD_Astarion_70.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_70.text: Although that's not to say we can't have a little fun.
CRD_Astarion_70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

CRD_Astarion_110.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_110.text: And I wish I was drinking out of Cazador's skull. Life is tough.

CRD_Astarion_109.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_109.text: I'm not ashamed. I just don't feel like boasting about it.

CRD_Astarion_30.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_30.text: Try it. You might have fun.

CRD_Astarion_34.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

CRD_Astarion_10.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_10.text: So, I see Lae'zel's marked you as her territory.

CRD_Astarion_92.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_92.text: I just hope she leaves you in one piece. We can't take a tenday for you to recover from whatever her idea of 'fun' is.

CRD_Astarion_2.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_2.text: So, I see you and Shadowheart have a connection. It looks very sweet.

CRD_Astarion_54.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_54.text: Not what I'd call 'fun', or 'interesting', but sweet.

CRD_Astarion_116.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_116.text: I'm sure I'll have a good time.

CRD_Astarion_169.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_169.text: Good for you. As for me, I'm going to drink until I'm sure I won't hear you grunting in the bushes.

CRD_Astarion_125.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_125.text: Ha! No, it so rarely is. But it might be fun.

CRD_Astarion_21.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_21.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the beating our gith friend will give you.

CRD_Astarion_24.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_24.text: As for me, I'm going to drink until I know I won't hear you grunting in the bushes.

CRD_Astarion_135.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_135.context: NodeContext: Toasts and drains his cup.

CRD_Astarion_76.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_76.text: Ha! No, my love, you and Shadowheart can hold hands all you want. It means nothing to me.

CRD_Astarion_119.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_119.text: Ha! No, my love, I'm not jealous of the drow. You have all the fun you want - if you survive the night.

CRD_Astarion_44.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_44.text: So, I see you and the drow have been making eyes at each other.

CRD_Astarion_171.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_171.text: She does seem like a fun romp. As long as she doesn't bite your head off halfway through the act.

CRD_Astarion_63.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_63.text: Are you offering anything better? Because I could be persuaded...

CRD_Astarion_93.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_93.text: So, has anyone in the camp caught your eye?

CRD_Astarion_55.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_55.text: There's no better way to unwind after a long day of killing.

CRD_Astarion_167.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_167.text: Shadowheart is looking very good tonight...

CRD_Astarion_147.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_147.text: I'm sure she is. If you can trust her not to bite your head off once you've done the deed.

CRD_Astarion_68.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_68.text: Ha! You're braver than I thought.

CRD_Astarion_182.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_182.text: I was thinking about you, actually.

CRD_Astarion_11.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_11.text: No, I'll spend the night alone.

CRD_Astarion_178.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_178.text: Whatever makes you happy, I suppose. As long as you don't come scratching at my door.

CRD_Astarion_129.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_129.context: NodeContext: Looking at player with lust

CRD_Astarion_82.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_82.text: By the hells. Sex, my dear. A night of passion.
CRD_Astarion_82.context: NodeContext: Can't believe how nieve you are

CRD_Astarion_106.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_106.text: What would you like to happen?

CRD_Astarion_53.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_53.text: What would you like to happen?

CRD_Astarion_136.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_136.text: Oh, a little talking, a little drinking, and - once everyone else is asleep - we get to know each other.
CRD_Astarion_136.context: NodeContext: It's sex. He means sex. Is it too subtle? Because it's sex he's talking about.

CRD_Astarion_37.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_37.text: We whip each other within an inch of our lives.

CRD_Astarion_56.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_56.text: I can replace those brutal fantasies of yours with desires you'll find much harder to push away.

CRD_Astarion_90.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_90.text: Well, I'd planned to bed you...

CRD_Astarion_9.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_9.text: Does Lae'zel know that? I saw how she looked at you earlier.

CRD_Astarion_156.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_156.text: I'd hate to get between the gith and her trophy. No, I think we'll end this evening as friends.

CRD_Astarion_121.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_121.text: Does Shadowheart know that? I saw how she looked at you earlier.

CRD_Astarion_32.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_32.text: I don't know what her idea of a good time is, but it seems to involve you. I'd hate to intrude.

CRD_Astarion_87.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_87.text: Does the drow know that? I saw how she looked at you earlier.

CRD_Astarion_89.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_89.text: Be careful with that one. Her idea of a good time probably involves biting your head off halfway through the act.

CRD_Astarion_43.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_43.text: Although I'm sure you'd know better than I would.

CRD_Astarion_6.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_6.text: Really? I thought you had other company planned this evening, and I'd hate to intrude.

CRD_Astarion_50.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_50.text: Well, I'd hate to get in the way of a well-laid plan. So to speak.

CRD_Astarion_12.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_12.text: Let's wait until things quieten down a bit. Once the others are asleep, we'll find each other.

CRD_Astarion_57.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_57.text: Indeed you will, my love. Indeed you will.

CRD_Astarion_139.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_139.text: On second thought, maybe we'd better not.

CRD_Astarion_7.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_7.text: Never listen to your second thoughts! They always spoil the fun.

CRD_Astarion_51.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_51.text: But fine. If you're determined to ruin your evening, I won't stop you.

CRD_Astarion_100.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_100.text: I'm flattered, but I think not. It's not you, you understand, it's me.

CRD_Astarion_181.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_181.text: Well, I'd planned to bed you...

CRD_Astarion_168.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_168.text: Well, I'd planned to bed you...

CRD_Astarion_94.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_94.text: Well, I'd had my heart set on bedding you.

CRD_Astarion_80.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_80.text: I'd hoped to get close to you, but I don't want to light you on fire.

CRD_Astarion_134.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_134.text: I'd hoped to get close to you, but I don't want to light you on fire.

CRD_Astarion_159.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_159.text: Nothing? How can you be so cruel?

CRD_Astarion_85.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_85.text: Come on. There's a spark here. I know you've felt it too, darling.
CRD_Astarion_85.context: NodeContext: Subtle and seductive. Restrained flirtation.

CRD_Astarion_59.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_59.text: I'd rather bed one of the goblins, darling.

CRD_Astarion_86.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_86.text: There isn't. I haven't. And that's all there is to it.

CRD_Astarion_64.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_64.text: I'm sorry, I mistook you for someone with taste.

CRD_Astarion_130.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_130.text: But have it your way. I'm happy to entertain myself.

CRD_Astarion_179.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_179.text: You are an insolent little pup, aren't you?
CRD_Astarion_179.context: NodeContext: They just told you they'd rather fuck a goblin. You're kind of amused, kind of angry,

CRD_Astarion_161.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_161.text: Fine. Enjoy your night with whatever goblin will have you.

CRD_Astarion_98.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_98.text: Well done! I'll see you tonight.

CRD_Astarion_163.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_163.text: Cheeky little pup. I'll see you later.

CRD_Astarion_95.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_95.text: I'm kidding. I'll see you tonight.

CRD_Astarion_88.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_88.text: Cheeky little pup. I'll see you later.

CRD_Astarion_49.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_49.text: Suit yourself. I've more than enough company.
CRD_Astarion_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player turns and walks away.NodeContext: Said to player as they walk away. You drain your cup afterwards.

CRD_Astarion_164.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_164.text: It was more a mountain of corpses than a pile...

CRD_Astarion_152.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_152.text: Ha! All right, to a mountain of corpses!
CRD_Astarion_152.context: CinematicNodeContext: Toasts and drinksNodeContext: Toasts and drinks

CRD_Astarion_115.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_115.context: NodeContext: Chuckles. He's been drinking blood

CRD_Astarion_140.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_140.text: What's your poison? I have - ah.
CRD_Astarion_140.context: NodeContext: Realises his wine's been stolen.

CRD_Astarion_16.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_16.text: I'm afraid I'm all out. This party is more humble than I'd like.
CRD_Astarion_16.context: NodeContext: his wine bottles have disappeared

CRD_Astarion_150.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_150.text: Although you're doing well enough on your own. I see Lae'zel's marked you as her territory.

CRD_Astarion_97.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_97.text: Although you're doing well enough on your own. I see you and Shadowheart have a connection. It looks very sweet.

CRD_Astarion_18.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_18.text: Although you're doing well enough on your own. I saw how the drow looked at you.

CRD_Astarion_1.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_1.text: So, given that we are fresh out of alcohol for you, what shall we get up to?
CRD_Astarion_1.context: NodeContext: Looking at player with lust

CRD_Astarion_4.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_4.text: I'm guessing you have something in mind.

CRD_Astarion_46.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_46.text: Well hello. What's on your mind?

CRD_Astarion_166.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_166.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Lae'zel.

CRD_Astarion_65.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_65.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with Shadowheart.

CRD_Astarion_91.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_91.text: Are you now? Well, lucky her.

CRD_Astarion_143.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_143.text: Well, you have fun. I'm more than happy with my cup anyway.

CRD_Astarion_149.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_149.text: Just so you know, I'm spending tonight with our drow host.

CRD_Astarion_67.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_67.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

CRD_Astarion_122.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_122.text: A bed and so much more.

CRD_Astarion_117.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_117.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

CRD_Astarion_72.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_72.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

CRD_Astarion_79.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_79.text: Interested in sharing a bed tonight?

CRD_Astarion_158.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_158.text: I have to admit, I wish I could share a bed with you tonight.

CRD_Astarion_112.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_112.text: Please, don't count me out just because of your condition. I'm always up for a challenge.
CRD_Astarion_112.context: NodeContext: Thinks he'll still be able to seduce the woman he cant' physically touch

CRD_Astarion_52.speaker: Player
CRD_Astarion_52.text: I have to admit, I wish I could share a bed with you tonight.

CRD_Astarion_102.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_102.text: Not quite yet, love. Let's wait until they're asleep.
CRD_Astarion_102.context: NodeContext: You've agreed to hook up, but it's not time yet

CRD_Astarion_111.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_111.text: Do you mind? I have a bottle to finish.

CRD_Astarion_142.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_142.text: How about some rest? It's been quite an evening.

CRD_Astarion_144.speaker: Astarion
CRD_Astarion_144.text: Oh don't come crawling back. It's just embarrassing.

CRD_Shadowheart_8.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_8.text: Shouldn't you be in someone else's bedroll by now?

CRD_Shadowheart_12.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_12.text: You sure know how to keep a party interesting.
CRD_Shadowheart_12.context: NodeContext: Droll understatement after the player killed Minthara (a drow 'ally'). She's had a few drinks.

CRD_Shadowheart_46.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_46.text: Makes me wonder if you treat all your lovers that harshly.
CRD_Shadowheart_46.context: NodeContext: Referring to the fact that the player slept with Minthara shortly before things turned violent.

CRD_Shadowheart_56.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_56.text: At least you've spared them the hangover tomorrow.
CRD_Shadowheart_56.context: NodeContext: Drunken dark humour. Them = Minthara and her goblins, killed at the party by the player.

CRD_Shadowheart_34.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_34.text: The fire's nice. I'll stay here a while.

CRD_Shadowheart_63.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_63.text: What a glorious celebration. Hip-deep in gore.

CRD_Shadowheart_28.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_28.text: The corpses probably do something extra for him, don't they?

CRD_Shadowheart_9.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_9.text: He does seem like the decadent type.

CRD_Shadowheart_1.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_1.text: I'm surprised she hasn't dragged you off to rut already.

CRD_Shadowheart_20.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_20.text: Not that I'm judging. I have this.
CRD_Shadowheart_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gestures with her bottle.

CRD_Shadowheart_60.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_60.text: Careful that she doesn't take a piece of you as a souvenir.

CRD_Shadowheart_11.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_11.text: The goblins stole good wine. It goes straight to the head.

CRD_Shadowheart_64.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_64.text: You're tearing through that bottle. Is something wrong?

CRD_Shadowheart_69.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_69.text: What's wrong with enjoying a gift from our guests?

CRD_Shadowheart_3.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_3.text: Maybe if I down enough of this swill, it'll pickle the worm in my skull.

CRD_Shadowheart_5.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_5.text: We set a pack of refugees on fire. A child could have done it.
CRD_Shadowheart_5.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart's tone is vaguely mocking.

CRD_Shadowheart_68.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_68.text: Not exactly an ambush for the ages.
CRD_Shadowheart_68.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart's tone is vaguely mocking.

CRD_Shadowheart_39.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_39.text: Would you like a better distraction?

CRD_Shadowheart_66.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_66.text: Not interested in a vampire's leftovers, I'm afraid.

CRD_Shadowheart_21.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_21.text: Not interested in Astarion's leftovers, I'm afraid.

CRD_Shadowheart_40.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_40.text: Not interested in a gith's leftovers, I'm afraid.

CRD_Shadowheart_44.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_44.text: Not interested in Minthara's leftovers, I'm afraid.

CRD_Shadowheart_17.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_17.text: Maybe... but I know better than to share my bed drunk.

CRD_Shadowheart_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_10.text: Unless you meant to raise my spirits by other means?

CRD_Shadowheart_22.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_22.text: We could sit by the fire?

CRD_Shadowheart_61.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_61.text: Ah, sitting. Such an engaging activity.

CRD_Shadowheart_14.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_14.text: But that... doesn't sound half bad.

CRD_Shadowheart_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player sits with Shadowheart by the campfire. After gazing into the fire for a moment, they turn to SH as if to say something, only to see she's already fallen asleep.

CRD_Shadowheart_50.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_50.text: Certainly not. I find your misery amusing.

CRD_Shadowheart_32.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_32.text: Well, I don't find you entertaining in the least.

CRD_Shadowheart_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_0.text: In fact, I prefer the wine to your blind stabs at mockery. Get away from me.

CRD_Shadowheart_49.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_49.text: You could share what's on your mind - if you want.

CRD_Shadowheart_31.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_31.text: I prefer to keep a few things secret. It's old habit.

CRD_Shadowheart_53.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_53.text: Thank you. The offer's kind, but it's not a kindness I can afford.

CRD_Shadowheart_57.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_57.text: I'm not sure what to say. I've never done any of this... comforting.

CRD_Shadowheart_43.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_43.text: It's awkward for me too, you know.

CRD_Shadowheart_65.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_65.text: How about a warsong? Something to celebrate your triumph.

CRD_Shadowheart_25.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_25.text: No more war tonight, I think.

CRD_Shadowheart_48.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_48.text: I'd prefer the quiet, if it's all the same to you.

CRD_Shadowheart_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_4.text: Get a girl's hopes up, why don't you? I need another bottle.

CRD_Shadowheart_54.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_54.text: Pull yourself together. Your behaviour is unbecoming.

CRD_Shadowheart_55.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_55.text: Guilty? Ridiculous. What's there to be guilty for?

CRD_Shadowheart_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_2.text: I serve the Lady of Loss. We stripped those tieflings of hope itself.

CRD_Shadowheart_41.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_41.text: Just... let me enjoy a drink in peace.

CRD_Shadowheart_23.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_23.text: My goddess smiles on such bloodshed.

CRD_Shadowheart_59.speaker: Player
CRD_Shadowheart_59.text: Will your magic to pierce Shadowheart's thoughts.

CRD_Shadowheart_18.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_18.text: Why did killing those tieflings make me feel sick?

CRD_Shadowheart_36.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_36.text: I've killed in her name before. Why now? Why isn't the wine helping?

CRD_Shadowheart_29.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Shadowheart_29.text: *Shadowheart's mind is drenched in drink and confusion. She's killed before - enjoyed it, even.*

CRD_Shadowheart_13.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Shadowheart_13.text: *But now an ill, twisting feeling lingers in her gut. One that has nothing to do with the wine.*

CRD_Shadowheart_52.speaker: Narrator
CRD_Shadowheart_52.text: *Your head swims, nausea burning in your gut.*

CRD_Shadowheart_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_26.text: You just... you! Get away from me. Now.

CRD_Shadowheart_67.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_Shadowheart_67.context: NodeContext: Drink's gone to her head. She waves off the player.

CRD_Gale_3.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_3.text: Go to sleep. If another knife awaits in the night, so be it.

CRD_Gale_17.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_17.text: Betrayed by a drow commander of the Absolute. How unexpected a turn of events.

CRD_Gale_10.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_10.text: How does it feel to kill a woman still flush with the warmth of your body? All par for the course for you, I suppose.

CRD_Gale_47.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_47.text: But no matter. What's one more kill but a fitting coda to a day of carnage?

CRD_Gale_26.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_26.text: This is the worst moment. When the screams of the dying have faded, and the conquering hordes howl and yelp as they come to their vile climax.

CRD_Gale_30.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_30.text: Massacre. A spectacle of slaughter. And I participated.

CRD_Gale_31.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_31.text: What are these bloody stumps that used to be such delicate harpists of the Weave?
CRD_Gale_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: He looks at his hands in Lady Macbeth fashion knowing that he participated in the destruction of the grove.NodeContext: He looks at his hands in Lady Macbeth fashion knowing that he participated in the destruction of the grove.

CRD_Gale_28.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_28.text: They're the hands they always were. You've a knack for this.

CRD_Gale_12.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_12.text: Two shadows are darkening my soul. The shadow within and the shadow without:

CRD_Gale_22.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_22.text: You led me down this path.

CRD_Gale_7.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_7.text: Yes. And I got you the Idol of Silvanus along the way.
CRD_Gale_7.context: InternalNodeContext: Gale consumed the idol after it was picked up after the Tiefling betrayal, but before this dialogue.

CRD_Gale_42.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_42.text: I don't know myself anymore. All this... It's not who I am. Around you, I'm not who I want to be.

CRD_Gale_8.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_8.text: Precious little love lost between us, isn't there?

CRD_Gale_16.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_16.context: NodeContext: The "and good riddance" is implied.

CRD_Gale_43.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_43.text: Stay. We make each other stronger. We make each other survive.

CRD_Gale_34.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_34.text: Yes. Yes, I suppose we do. Few things are more powerful than the will to live.

CRD_Gale_50.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_50.text: But carnage such as this... The shadow within is spreading like poison, corrupting kindness and compassion.

CRD_Gale_0.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_0.text: Perhaps you'll understand me better when you know the truth of my condition.

CRD_Gale_14.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_14.text: Go on then. There's no time like the present.

CRD_Gale_9.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_9.text: No - a night like this is unfit to bear witness to such a tale. It's unfit for most things. Now please - permit me some peace amidst this vile revelry. We'll speak, but another time.
CRD_Gale_9.context: NodeContext: Grim, deeply unhappy with everything that's happened (including having to endure a party of drunken goblins). Firmly but politely telling the player to go away.

CRD_Gale_36.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_36.text: I guess I'll find out, when you're ready to tell me.

CRD_Gale_18.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_18.text: You will. But not until then. Now please - I'd prefer to be alone with my regrets. Enjoy these vile revelries, if that's your inclination. It certainly isn't mine.
CRD_Gale_18.context: NodeContext: Grim, deeply unhappy with everything that's happened (including having to endure a party of drunken goblins). Firmly but politely telling the player to go away.

CRD_Gale_6.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_6.text: I thought the orb to be the greatest of my sins, but I see now there are darker depths to which I might yet sink. You may be content to sink into that abyss, but I assure you - I am not.
CRD_Gale_6.context: NodeContext: Stern/grim - not impressed with the player's recent behaviour. Ending the conversation.

CRD_Gale_20.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_20.text: At what cost? Are our lives truly worth so many others?

CRD_Gale_2.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_2.text: I can see the answer in your eyes. And that's why I'm leaving.

CRD_Gale_25.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_25.text: You don't stand a chance alone. You're free to go. I dare you.

CRD_Gale_37.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_37.text: Gods damn you - you're right. Few things are more powerful than the will to live.

CRD_Gale_13.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_13.text: What chances I have, I'll take them. I'd rather roll the dice than deliver all this death.

CRD_Gale_19.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_19.text: Yes. And I got you the Idol of Silvanus along the way.
CRD_Gale_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player collected the Idol after betrating the Tieflings but hasn't given it to Gale yet.

CRD_Gale_24.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_24.text: I'm sorry you feel that way.

CRD_Gale_35.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_35.text: It's time to stop making excuses.

CRD_Gale_15.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_15.text: You make your own choices. Don't blame me for their outcomes.

CRD_Gale_27.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_27.text: Don't blame me for detesting them.

CRD_Gale_5.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_5.text: Quit whining. You're killing the mood.

CRD_Gale_41.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_41.text: You really are absolutely heartless, aren't you?

CRD_Gale_48.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_48.text: You've seen your own true nature. Accept it.

CRD_Gale_46.speaker: Player
CRD_Gale_46.text: Perhaps we've gone too far, but what's done is done.

CRD_Gale_38.speaker: Gale
CRD_Gale_38.text: I've said my piece. Now let me dull my tongue with wine.
